uvi.description:
net: ll_temac: Make sure to free skb when it is completely used

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.128 by commit 6d120ab4dc39a543c6b63361e1d0541c382900a3. For more details please see the references link.
